patthana2.5:9.1: Ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:9.2: sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ kāyaganthaṃ paṭicca abhijjhākāyagantho, abhijjhākāyaganthaṃ paṭicca sīlabbataparāmāso kāyagantho, idaṃsaccābhinivesaṃ kāyaganthaṃ paṭicca abhijjhākāyagantho, abhijjhākāyaganthaṃ paṭicca idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho. #1
patthana2.5:10.1: Ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:10.2: ganthe paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.5:11.1: Ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:11.2: sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ kāyaganthaṃ paṭicca abhijjhākāyagantho sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
patthana2.5:12.1: Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:12.2: noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.5:12.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …. #1
patthana2.5:13.1: Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:14.1: Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:14.2: noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā ganthā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.5:15.1: Ganthañca noganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:15.2: sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ kāyaganthañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca abhijjhākāyagantho.
patthana2.5:16.1: Ganthañca noganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:16.2: noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca ganthe ca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.5:16.6: ganthe ca sampayuttake khandhe ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.5:17.1: Ganthañca noganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:17.2: noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthañca paṭicca tayo khandhā abhijjhākāyagantho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe ….
patthana2.5:21.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.5:26.1: Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:26.2: ahetukaṃ noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.5:26.6: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe (yāva asaññasattā), vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.5:28.1: Ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.5:29.1: Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.5:30.1: Ganthañca noganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.5:30.2: ganthe ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana2.5:33.1: Ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.5:33.2: arūpe idaṃsaccābhinivesaṃ kāyaganthaṃ paṭicca abhijjhākāyagantho, abhijjhākāyaganthaṃ paṭicca idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho (arūpe sīlabbataparāmāso natthi, evaṃ nava pañhā kātabbā), napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.5:36.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.5:40.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … anantare ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana2.5:47.1: Ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.5:48.1: Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:48.2: noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.5:48.8: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā.
patthana2.5:49.1: Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:49.2: noganthe khandhe paccayā ganthā, vatthuṃ paccayā ganthā. #2
patthana2.5:50.1: Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:50.2: noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā ganthā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.5:50.6: vatthuṃ paccayā ganthā sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.5:51.1: Ganthañca noganthañca dhammaṃ paccayā gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:51.2: sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ kāyaganthañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayā abhijjhākāyagantho (cakkaṃ).
patthana2.5:52.1: Ganthañca noganthañca dhammaṃ paccayā nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:52.2: noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca ganthe ca paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.5:52.6: ganthe ca vatthuñca paccayā noganthā khandhā. #2
patthana2.5:53.1: Ganthañca noganthañca dhammaṃ paccayā gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:53.2: noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ kāyaganthañca paccayā tayo khandhā abhijjhākāyagantho ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.5:53.7: Sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ kāyaganthañca vatthuñca paccayā abhijjhākāyagantho ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.5:56.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.5:60.1: Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nogantho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:60.2: ahetukaṃ noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.5:60.11: Vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā noganthā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.5:63.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava.
patthana2.5:65.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.5:67.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana2.5:69.1: (Nissayavāro paccayavārasadisova. Saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi nava pañhā kātabbā, rūpaṃ natthi.)
patthana2.5:74.1: Gantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:74.2: ganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ ganthānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.5:75.1: Gantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:75.2: ganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.5:76.1: Gantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:76.2: ganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ganthānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:77.1: Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:77.2: noganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:78.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:78.2: noganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ ganthānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.5:79.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:79.2: noganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ganthānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:80.1: Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā ganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:80.2: ganthā ca noganthā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ ganthānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.5:81.1: Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā noganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:81.2: ganthā ca noganthā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.5:82.1: Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:82.2: ganthā ca noganthā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ganthānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:84.1: Gantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:84.6: Ganthe ārabbha ganthā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.5:85.1: Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:85.4: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni … pe …
patthana2.5:85.8: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.5:85.9: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:85.16: vatthuṃ noganthe khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.5:85.19: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.5:85.20: Cetopariyañāṇena noganthacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana2.5:85.28: noganthā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.5:86.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:86.4: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.5:86.11: vatthuṃ noganthe khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati. #2
patthana2.5:87.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:87.4: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha ganthā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti, pubbe suciṇṇāni … pe …
patthana2.5:87.10: vatthuṃ noganthe khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha ganthā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.5:88.1: Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā ganthassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.5:90.1: Gantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.5:91.1: Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:91.20: nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:91.23: vatthuṃ noganthe khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.5:91.25: noganthādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.5:92.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:92.16: vatthuṃ noganthe khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.5:93.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:93.6: noganthe khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā ganthā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.5:93.8: noganthādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ganthānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:94.1: Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā ganthassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:96.1: Gantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:96.2: purimā purimā ganthā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ ganthānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.5:97.1: Gantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:97.2: purimā purimā ganthā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ noganthānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:98.1: Gantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:98.2: purimā purimā ganthā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ ganthānaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:99.1: Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.5:100.1: Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā ganthassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.5:102.1: Gantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo … nava … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … nava … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nava, nissayapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.5:104.1: Gantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:105.1: Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:106.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:107.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:107.5: saddhaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana2.5:107.11: senāsanaṃ ganthānaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:108.1: Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā ganthassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:110.1: Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:110.8: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana2.5:111.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:111.6: vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.5:112.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:112.6: vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha ganthā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.5:112.8: vatthu ganthānaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:113.1: Pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi, āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.5:115.1: Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:115.4: noganthā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:115.8: noganthā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.5:116.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:116.2: noganthā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ ganthānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.5:117.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:117.2: noganthā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ganthānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:119.1: Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ … āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … maggapaccayena paccayo … nava … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.5:121.1: Gantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:122.1: Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:123.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.5:124.1: Nogantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.5:124.3: vatthu ganthānaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:125.1: Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā noganthassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:127.1: Gantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.5:128.1: Gantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.5:234.2: diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā lobho ca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.5:234.6: domanassasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā paṭighañca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.5:235.1: Ganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:235.2: ganthavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …

patthana2.5:237.1: Ganthasampayuttañca ganthavippayuttañca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:237.2: diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ lobhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca lobhañca saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.5:237.6: domanassasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca paṭighañca saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.5:240.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha (sabbattha cha), vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre cha … pe … avigate cha.

patthana2.5:244.6: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.5:247.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte cha, naāsevane cha, nakamme cattāri, navipāke cha, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte cha.
patthana2.5:249.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte cha, naāsevane cha, nakamme cattāri, navipāke cha, navippayutte cha.
patthana2.5:251.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana2.5:258.1: Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:258.2: ganthasampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.5:259.1: Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:259.2: ganthasampayuttā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:259.3: diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagato hetu lobhassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:259.4: domanassasahagato hetu paṭighassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.5:260.1: Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:260.2: ganthasampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:260.3: diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagato hetu sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:260.4: domanassasahagato hetu sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:261.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:261.2: ganthavippayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:261.3: diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:262.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:262.2: diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:263.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:263.2: diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:263.3: paṭighaṃ sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:264.1: Ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammā ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:264.2: diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagato hetu ca lobho ca sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:264.3: domanassasahagato hetu ca paṭighañca sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.5:265.1: Ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammā ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:265.2: diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagato hetu ca lobho ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:265.3: domanassasahagato hetu ca paṭighañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2

patthana2.5:266.2: diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagato hetu ca lobho ca sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:266.3: domanassasahagato hetu ca paṭighañca sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:268.1: Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:268.2: ganthasampayutte khandhe ārabbha ganthasampayuttakā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.5:268.3: (Tīsupi mūlā pucchitabbā) Ganthasampayutte khandhe ārabbha ganthavippayuttā khandhā uppajjanti, ganthasampayutte khandhe ārabbha diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca uppajjanti, domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.5:269.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:269.4: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:269.5: ariyā ganthavippayutte pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, cakkhuṃ … pe …
patthana2.5:269.7: vatthuṃ ganthavippayutte khandhe ca lobhañca paṭighañca aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha ganthavippayutto rāgo uppajjati, vicikicchā … pe …
patthana2.5:269.13: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena ganthavippayuttacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana2.5:269.21: ganthavippayuttā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.5:270.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:270.10: taṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha ganthasampayutto rāgo uppajjati …
patthana2.5:271.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:271.4: vatthuṃ ganthavippayutte khandhe ca lobhañca paṭighañca ārabbha diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.5:272.1: Ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammā ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:272.2: diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobhañca domanassasahagate khandhe ca paṭighañca ārabbha ganthasampayuttakā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.5:272.4: Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobhañca domanassasahagate khandhe ca paṭighañca ārabbha ganthavippayuttā khandhā uppajjanti, diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobhañca domanassasahagate khandhe ca paṭighañca ārabbha diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca uppajjanti. #3

patthana2.5:274.4: ganthasampayutte khandhe garuṃ katvā ganthasampayuttakā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.5:275.1: Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:275.4: ganthasampayutte khandhe garuṃ katvā diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho uppajjati.

patthana2.5:275.8: domanassasahagatādhipati paṭighassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.5:276.1: Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:276.4: ganthasampayutte khandhe garuṃ katvā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.5:276.6: diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:276.7: domanassasahagatādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:277.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:277.8: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:277.11: vatthuṃ ganthavippayutte khandhe ca lobhañca garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā ganthavippayutto rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.5:277.13: ganthavippayuttādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.5:278.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.5:278.15: vatthuṃ ganthavippayutte khandhe ca lobhañca garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā ganthasampayutto rāgo uppajjati …
patthana2.5:279.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.5:280.1: Ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammā ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.5:280.3: diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobhañca garuṃ katvā ganthasampayuttakā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.5:280.4: (Mūlā pucchitabbā) Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobhañca garuṃ katvā diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho uppajjati.
patthana2.5:280.5: (Mūlā pucchitabbā) Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobhañca garuṃ katvā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.5:282.1: Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:282.2: purimā purimā ganthasampayuttā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ ganthasampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.5:282.3: (Mūlā pucchitabbā) Purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa diṭṭhigatavippayuttassa lobhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:282.4: purimā purimā domanassasahagatā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa paṭighassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:282.6: (Mūlā pucchitabbā) Purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:282.7: purimā purimā domanassasahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:283.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:283.2: purimo purimo diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho pacchimassa pacchimassa diṭṭhigatavippayuttassa lobhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:283.3: purimaṃ purimaṃ paṭighaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa paṭighassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:283.4: purimā purimā ganthavippayuttā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ ganthavippayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:284.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:284.2: purimo purimo diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:284.3: purimaṃ purimaṃ paṭighaṃ pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:285.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:285.2: purimo purimo diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:285.3: purimaṃ purimaṃ paṭighaṃ pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:285.4: āvajjanā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:286.1: Ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammā ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:286.2: purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:286.3: purimā purimā domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.5:286.4: (Mūlā pucchitabbā) Purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca pacchimassa pacchimassa diṭṭhigatavippayuttassa lobhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:286.5: purimā purimā domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca pacchimassa pacchimassa paṭighassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:286.6: diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.5:286.7: (Mūlā pucchitabbā) Purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:286.8: purimā purimā domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:288.1: Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.5:290.1: Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:290.5: ganthasampayuttā khandhā ganthasampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.5:290.7: Ganthasampayuttā khandhā ganthavippayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.5:290.9: Ganthasampayuttā khandhā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.5:290.10: domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:291.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:292.1: Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.5:380.1: Ganthañceva ganthasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:380.2: sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ kāyaganthaṃ paṭicca abhijjhākāyagantho sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.5:381.1: Ganthasampayuttañceva no ca ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:381.2: ganthasampayuttañceva no ca ganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana2.5:382.1: Ganthasampayuttañceva no ca ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:382.2: ganthasampayutte ceva no ca ganthe khandhe paṭicca ganthā. #2
patthana2.5:383.1: Ganthasampayuttañceva no ca ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:383.2: ganthasampayuttañceva no ca ganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā ganthā ca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.5:384.1: Ganthañceva ganthasampayuttañca ganthasampayuttañceva no ca ganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:384.2: ganthe ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca ganthā. #1

patthana2.5:385.2: ganthasampayuttañceva no ca ganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca ganthe ca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …. #2
patthana2.5:386.1: Ganthañceva ganthasampayuttañca ganthasampayuttañceva no ca ganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:386.2: ganthasampayuttañceva no ca ganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ kāyaganthañca paṭicca tayo khandhā abhijjhākāyagantho ca … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe ….
patthana2.5:387.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), kamme nava, āhāre nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.5:389.1: Ganthañceva ganthasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana2.5:390.1: (Idha nahetupaccayo natthi) Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana2.5:393.1: (Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā.)
patthana2.5:398.1: Gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca dhammo ganthassa ceva ganthasampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:398.2: ganthā ceva ganthasampayuttā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ ganthānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.5:399.1: Gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ceva no ca ganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:399.2: ganthā ceva ganthasampayuttā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.5:400.1: Gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca dhammo ganthassa ceva ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthasampayuttassa ceva no ca ganthassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:400.2: ganthā ceva ganthasampayuttā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ganthānañca hetupaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana2.5:401.2: ganthasampayuttā ceva no ca ganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ ganthānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana2.5:404.2: ganthā ceva ganthasampayuttā ca ganthasampayuttā ceva no ca ganthā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.5:405.1: Gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho ca dhammā ganthasampayuttassa ceva no ca ganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:405.2: ganthā ceva ganthasampayuttā ca ganthasampayuttā ceva no ca ganthā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.5:406.1: Gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho ca dhammā ganthassa ceva ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthasampayuttassa ceva no ca ganthassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:406.2: ganthā ceva ganthasampayuttā ca ganthasampayuttā ceva no ca ganthā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ganthānañca hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.5:408.1: Gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca dhammo ganthassa ceva ganthasampayuttassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:408.4: Ganthe ārabbha ganthasampayuttā ceva no ca ganthā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.5:408.6: Ganthe ārabbha ganthā ca ganthasampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.5:409.1: Ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ceva no ca ganthassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.5:409.2: ganthasampayutte ceva no ca ganthe khandhe ārabbha ganthasampayuttā ceva no ca ganthā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.5:409.4: Ganthasampayutte ceva no ca ganthe khandhe ārabbha ganthā uppajjanti.
patthana2.5:409.6: Ganthasampayutte ceva no ca ganthe khandhe ārabbha ganthā ca ganthasampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.5:410.1: (Evaṃ itarepi tīṇi pañhā kātabbā ārammaṇasadisaṃyeva. Adhipatiyāpi anantarepi upanissayepi vibhāgo natthi.)
patthana2.5:414.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.5:415.1: (Arūpaṃyeva paccayaṃ, ekekassa tīṇi tīṇi kātabbā. Ārammaṇañca sahajātañca upanissayañca navasupi parivattetabbaṃ. Evaṃ pañhāvārepi sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ.)
patthana2.5:420.1: Ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayuttaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.5:420.2: ganthavippayuttaṃ ganthaniyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
